job.title: Site Reliability Engineer - Infrastructure
job.description: <p>Goal: To facilitate and empower every team/individual managing services at scale. Scope: This team manages all infra services across ByteDance as well as TikTok operation in the US. As the team is ramping up, it is very operation-heavy, and now we are moving into a future of automation/code-heavy projects. We would like to automate ourselves out of work! Responsibilities: Build and maintain our advanced compute, network and storage infrastructure. Build automation to manage and monitor infrastructure services and applications. Experience in configuration management and infrastructure provisioning (Tech: Chef, Puppet, Ansible, Terraform). Experience or strong knowledge on: storage concepts (object/block/file storage, NFS), compute concepts (different OS environments, virtualization), networking concepts (DNS, HTTP, TCP, UDP, IP), database concepts (MySQL/PostgreSQL databases, Linux servers)</p>
